justification: Participants completed an abbreviated Moral Foundations Questionnaire to measure their levels of Ingroup Loyalty and were assigned arguments based on their scores.
The Moral Foundations Questionnaire was used to measure participants' levels of Fairness, with arguments tailored to their scores.
The Big Five Inventory was administered to participants to measure their levels of Openness, which was then used to tailor arguments accordingly.
Participants' Conscientiousness levels were assessed using the Big Five Inventory, which informed the tailoring of personality-based arguments.
